main_definition: CVS is a common abbreviation that primarily refers to CVS Pharmacy, a large retail pharmacy chain in the United States.

meanings_and_examples.example: The CVSS Columbia was an American Concorde bomber of the 1950s.
A Customer Value System is a business approach focused on providing value to customers, aiming to deliver high-quality products and services that meet their needs and preferences.
CVS Health offers Clinical Verification Services which help healthcare providers verify the accuracy of medical claims data for reimbursement purposes.
